name: Tower Defendn't
description:
Tower Defendn't is a simple Tower Defense game with a twist. Your turrets can friendly fire at you, slowly changing the gameplay to a more bullet hell style survival game. Place turrets to fight off waves of enemies, but dont get too cocky and take yourself the space needed to survive. Are you up for the challenge?

Game made by:

d0msen

Titan

Hanni

strongworld

Special thanks to:

soɯǝouǝ.  for making all sounds and music for us
